data.comment: The match is underway in Oita.
Throw-in for Kashima at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 2, Kashima have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Oita is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kashima's Yasushi Endo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 3, Goal kick for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 5, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
Yuya Takazawa is on target to give Oita a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 5, Toshio Shimakawa with an assist there.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
In the minute 8, Kashima are pushing forward but Ryuji Izumi's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Oita.
Yuta Koide for Oita gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Kashima at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Oita to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Kashima throw-in in Oita's half.
In the minute 15, Everaldo grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Oita.
In the minute 17, Oita have a dangerous throw-in.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Kashima push forward at Showa Denko Dome Oita and Katsuya Nagato gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Oita defence.
In the minute 20, Kashima's Kento Misao gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Oita defender.
Kashima are coming forward and Kento Misao gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
Throw-in Oita.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Oita throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 24, Yasushi Endo of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Oita have a goal kick.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 27, Toshio Shimakawa (Oita) has received a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Oita.
Kashima's Tomoya Inukai gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 35, Goal kick for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Kashima.
In Oita, Kei Chinen of Oita is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 36, Kashima have a goal kick.
Penalty! Hiroki Kasahara points to the spot, great chance for Kashima...
Goal! Everaldo gives Kashima the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-2.
In the minute 44, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kashima's Everaldo has run offside.
In the minute 45, Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Oita.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Oita.
In Oita, Tatsuya Tanaka (Oita) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Kashima.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
The second half has started at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
In the minute 46, Free kick Oita.
Oita make their first substitution with Daiki Watari replacing Kei Chinen.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Kashima throw-in in Oita's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Oita goal kick.
In the minute 48, Oita to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Kashima.
Kashima's Ryuji Izumi breaks free at Showa Denko Dome Oita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 48, Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Oita's half?
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Kashima.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in high up the field for Oita in Oita.
Oita have been awarded a corner by Hiroki Kasahara.
Oita are caught offside.
In the minute 55, Kashima take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Everaldo.
That's a fine assist from Shoma Doi.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
In the minute 60, Hiroki Kasahara awards Oita a goal kick.
Kashima have a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Toshio Shimakawa with Kazuhiro Sato. This is the second substitution made today by Tomohiro Katanosaka.
In the minute 62, Ryuji Izumi for the away team is judged to be offside.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Kashima just outside Oita's area.
Kento Misao's header is off-target for Kashima.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Oita awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kento Misao (Kashima) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
In Oita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 73, Yuya Takazawa of Oita is pulled up for offside.
Yuya Takazawa (Oita) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Hitoshi Sogahata for Kashima who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Hitoshi Sogahata is back on the pitch.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Oita.
Kazuhiro Sato (Oita) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Oita.
Seigo Kobayashi is on a sub for Tatsuya Tanaka for Oita.
At Showa Denko Dome Oita, Kashima are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 80, In Oita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Oita get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Oita attack but Seigo Kobayashi's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Kashima at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Free kick for Oita in their own half.
Throw-in for Oita in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 83, Hiroki Kasahara awards Kashima a goal kick.
Ryohei Shirasaki is replacing Yasushi Endo for the away team.
Hiroki Kasahara signals a Oita throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 85, Hiroki Kasahara awards the away team a throw-in.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Kashima to take a throw-in in Oita territory.
Throw-in for Oita at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Oita.
In the minute 88, Throw-in Kashima.
Free kick Oita.
Ryota Nagaki is replacing Leo Silva for Kashima at Showa Denko Dome Oita.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Oita awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Throw-in for Oita in their own half.
Oita have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Oita.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroki Kasahara awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroki Kasahara blows to end the match. The final score is 1-4.
The away team replace Everaldo with Sho Ito.
Kashima make their fourth substitution with Ryotaro Araki replacing Shoma Doi.
Goal! Sho Ito extends Kashima's lead to 1-4.
